short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help to automate mark data entry on bot like Xamta for Teachers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swift Helper is now available for Edge. It extends Xamta web app with features that are missing. It will help to Automate the bot like Xamta by swift chat and Saral Gujarat for Teachers.

It is an open-source project. For 

bugs/questions/contribution:
 https://github.com/incpi/Swift-Helper-browser-extension

Guide:
https://incpi.github.io/Swift-Helper-browser-extension

Features:
- Import File 
- Export File exam wise.
- Save all marks with one click
- No extra unnecessary manual work
- Tabular table format to quickly update data
- Multiple exam input in one window
